Posts.Content: Jan 7, 2014 12:57PM Kleenie wrote: Your situation sounds a lot like mine.  I had an MRI in September that showed 3 spots.  2 on the breast cancer side and one of the good breast.  I had an MRI guided biopsy on one of the ones on the breast cancer side that came back benign.  The radiologist wanted me to come back in 6 months for another MRI.  The breast surgeon felt more comfortable with 3 months.  I see her tomorrow for my results.  So I wouldn't worry to much about the switch in when you have to go back for the MRI.  They are probably being proactive.  I have had 4 biopsies in the past year including the one that found my cancer.   Good luck and I hope you get good results.
Posts.Title: A surprise three month follow up hobie644 Kleenie
